overview: In a mountain town where small-sized ranches scatter around, financial difficulty of ranches is caused and the animas fall in crisis of being butchered. By the way Su-Jin, who visits there for liquidation of ranch, determines to run a ranch with vague expectation captured by peaceful pastoral landscape. Though she attracts scattered herdsmen and readjust the ranch, she is deeply discouraged by the chairman's plot to build a luxurious villa by purchasing her ranch. In spite of inhospitality and disdain of neighbors she tires to resuscitate ranch but she determines to sell her ranch due to desperation. However those who are impressed by her pathetically sincere struggles help her to rebuild the ranch.
title: Brave People
